# wirk force ≈ vir ⇔ fire

warring warrior class

𐛧 𐙇𐘾 KA guerre ⇔ vir

𒆜 𒄒 𒆙 𒉫 𒌩 力 lìrum •l'virum "force" ( KASKAL GIŠ%GIŠ KAL%KAL Kraft )

𒌷 ᵛURU vir 𒍇𒊒 u₁₈-ru 𒋀𒀊 uru₁₅ 𒂗 urunₓ wehrhaft viral "exalted; strong"

𓋹 pro > vir bio vita ⇔ wind

wir ⋍ man ⇔ wǒ:mén 我门

𓅱 𓇋 𓀀, 𓇋, 𓍢 𓇋 , 𓏌 𓎡 𓍢

𓅷 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓂺 𓀀 | male, man | parai.sen ἄρσην ᵖársēn पुरुष puruṣa > vyriškas vyrų > vir

𒇽 LÚ = awīlum "man"

Hapiru Hebrew

𒄩𒉿𒊑 ḫāwirī ϩⲁⲓ ϩⲉⲓ (first) husband, man ⇔ sir
𒀀𒉿𒇻 a-wi-raᵐ vir "man" ( 𒇻 ram > Lamm 𓃝 > 𓃙 p-r ) 𒀀𒉿𒈝 a-wi-rum 𒈝 •RUM > LUM vir ≈ πⲣⲱⲙⲓ ≈ πRoman pyromane 𒎌 ⲣⲱⲙⲓˢ roh-mensch ;) 𓂋 𓅓 𓍿 𓀀 ⲣⲱⲙⲓˢ vir:humans

Hammurabi ("šumma awīlum awīlam", if a man another man…)
𒀀𒉿𒈝 a-wi-lum awīlum (subject)
𒀀𒉿𒇴 a-wi-lam awīlam (object)

𒌉𒀀𒉿𒅆 awīlim / awīlum class 𒌉 -dom kingdom

𒀀𒉿𒇻𒌅 a-wi-lu-tu •viratuᵐ humanity (Lamm<ram) •viramtion ⇔ virality

𒀀𒉿𒅋𒌓 a-wi-il-tam awīltam woman!
